name: Cal
short_description:
Cal is a rolling-release AI designed to make using windows easy, understandable, and a little fun. Along with giving the user complete control over there operating system to do, almost anything.

Cal isn't just for low-level users. It can be a great asset for developers too. With capability to shortcut a lot of long-ended processes and cut running extensive commands in half.

Once you download Cal for the first time, there is no need to ever reinstall again, as everything is installed and updated automatically. If you think your missing-out on all of what Cal can do, you can read the Wiki (WIP) to view all of Cal's current features.

Note: This is a very early release of the Cal project. Expect some ruff-edges.
summary: A Windows AI designed to make using Windows a breeze.
